meta.description: Canonical multimodal baseline featuring a CircleSDF shader, Tone.Synth audio bed, and haptic pulse cues.
meta.title: Circle Interaction Baseline

shader.description: Minimal circle signed distance field shader.

input_parameters.description: Controls the normalized horizontal offset of the circle.
input_parameters.label: Circle center X

input_parameters.description: Controls the normalized vertical offset of the circle.
input_parameters.label: Circle center Y

input_parameters.description: Controls the circle radius in normalized units.
input_parameters.label: Circle radius

shader.name: CircleSDF

uniforms.description: Normalized X offset for the circle center.
uniforms.name: u_px

uniforms.description: Normalized Y offset for the circle center.
uniforms.name: u_py

tone.description: Canonical Tone.Synth baseline with envelope and reverb.

input_parameters.description: Overall gain staging for the synth output.
input_parameters.label: Synth volume

input_parameters.description: Fine tune offset applied to the oscillator.
input_parameters.label: Oscillator detune

input_parameters.description: Glide time between subsequent notes.
input_parameters.label: Portamento

tone.name: Baseline Synth
